# Aimfox (opt-in reference)

Use these notes as **on-demand context** in Cursor by referencing them in chat, e.g. `@docs/vendor/aimfox/api-cheatsheet.md`.

- Canonical docs: `https://docs.aimfox.com/`
- Webhooks docs: `https://docs.aimfox.com/webhooks`

## Files

- `api-cheatsheet.md`: Auth, rate limits, base URLs, common workflows + endpoints.
- `insomnia-export.md`: How to store/use your Insomnia export JSON alongside these notes.
